display_long_description:
**EXPLORE LIMINAL: 140+ Experiences to WOW you and Transform your Mood.**

Get Liminal now and try it out for FREE!

Six categories to explore. Over 800,000 in app five-star ratings!

Make sure you try **Samsara** in the Awe Arena
[media]

Reduce anxiety, meditate, breathe or grab a pillow to lie down and sleep. Try hypnosis to distract you from pain and reduce stress. 
[media]

Play exciting casual games and other interactive content. Liminal is much more than a mindfulness app:
[media]

**Experience Awe. Find Relief. Enhance your Focus.**

Liminal is a great way to chill out and have some fun!

Subscribe for unlimited access. Or enjoy a weekly rotation of FREE experiences. 

- "Incredible, Beautiful, and Jaw Dropping”
- “Amazing and relaxing!”
- “Makes the oculus worth it”

Designed with neuroscientists and psychologists and a community of partners. Earn credits in the Lab to save your favorites. 

Take your first steps and try **Cyberpunch, Flux, Boundless** and more!

There is always plenty to try with Liminal!
